1. 사과식초를 물에 희석한다.
     비율(식초2: 물1)
2.  희석된 식초를  화장솜에 적셔서  얼굴 전체를 잘 닦아 준다.
3.  좁쌀, 편평사마귀, 사마귀 물사마귀, 쥐젖 부분에
     식초액을 적신 화장솜이나 밴드를 붙인다 
   (매일밤 붙여놓는다)1~2주

사과식초            2

How to get rid of narrow rice, warts, squamous warts, warts, and rat milk all at once
 
"You can get rid of it with just one vinegar from the flat lion"
 
I saw the video introduced by the head of YouTube's technology department
I followed along, too.
 
It became clean as if the virus and bacteria disappeared overnight.
 
1. Dilute apple vinegar in water.
Ratio (Vinegar 2: Water 1)
2. Wet the diluted vinegar on a cotton pad and wipe the entire face well.
3. Small rice, flat warts, warts, and rat's milk
Put a cotton pad or bandage soaked in vinegar
(I put it on every night) 1 to 2 weeks
 
[Making proportions]
Mineral Water (Skin Toner) 1
Apple Vinegar 2
 
I recommend apple vinegar
Organic vinegar is soft, so it's good to eat
It's also good to use^^
 
* Please use it after the allergy test^^

Like!
Thank you so much^^*
